source.name: Real-Time Traffic Speed Data
source.description: NYCDOT's Traffic Management Center (TMC) maintains a map of traffic speed detectors throughout the City. The speed detector themselves belong to various city and state agencies. The Traffic Speeds Map is available on the DOT's website (http://nyctmc.org/ ). This data feed contains 'real-time' traffic information from locations where NYCDOT picks up sensor feeds within the five boroughs, mostly on major arterials and highways. NYCDOT uses this information for emergency response and management.
